contextswitching

Class ContextSwitchingModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.engine.SimState
      • contextswitching.ContextSwitchingModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ContextSwitchingModel
extends sim.engine.SimState
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A context switching model implemented in MASON The model stores the networks loaded from the configuration provided, the agent population and the Agent positions in the contexts
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configureModel

        public ContextSwitchingModel configureModel(ModelConfiguration config)
        Configure the model
        Parameters:
        population - Integer - number of agents to be created
        numNetworks - Integer - number of network layers to be constructed
        consensusRequired - Double - consensus required for a simulation run to stop
        contextSwitching - Double[] - vector of probabilities to switch a context for each existing context
        networksToBeLoaded - File[] - network files to be loaded to the layers
        Returns:
        model ContextSwitchingModel - the instance of the model to be created

      • initializeModel

        public ContextSwitchingModel initializeModel()
        Must be called before start, meaning before the simulation starts one must: configureModel(...) initializeModel(); run the simulation Configures the model according to the parameters specified with the configureModel(...) method This should be done before dispatching the model to the grid as some configurations require reading local files
        Returns:
        model ContextSwitchingModel the initialized model ready to run
